welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Le Pre-Saint-Gervais, a charming and picturesque city known for its lively street markets and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique culture and beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly low-cost airlines and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. A premium option is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal, divided into 7 sub-terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow during peak hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
